law.catch_line: The Department may suspend, revoke, or modify a sewage sludge utilization permit in accordance with ...

text.section:
The Department may refuse to renew a sewage sludge utilization permit if:
The permit holder violates this subtitle, any regulation adopted by the Department under this subtitle, or any condition of the permit;
The Department determines that continued operation of any area covered by the permit would be injurious to public health or the environment; or
The Department determines that there is any other good cause.
